name: Wheelchair Wizards
description:
Wizards on a tower fighting waves of goblins and each other, on wheelchairs, for ultimate power (and a ride home).

Don't fall and survive the increasingly difficult waves of goblin hordes.

Made for Global Game Jam 15
Theme: Waves

Controls:

  • Player 1: A/D -> Rotate, S-> Shoot/Move
  • Player2: Left/Right -> Rotate, Down -> Shoot/Move
  • Player3: Left Analog ->Rotate, A Button -> Shoot/Move
  • Player4: Left Analog ->Rotate, A Button -> Shoot/Move

Credits:

  • Simon-Kai Garvie - Programming
  • Ross Borchers - Programming
  • Herman Martinus - Art and Design
  • Ivo Sissolak - Sound
